review: This is strictly and entertainment device.I have Dish, Netflix and the internet.  So this device added nothing new, except to have netflix on the big screen (but resolution was not that good - it's actually better on the PC or laptop!).My wife and I also use ClearPlay.  This allows us to edit out violence, swear words, and sex scenes, and I can't do that with the streaming videos offered by Amazon Fire TV.
